cancelDownloadConfirmation.title: Cancel Download Confirmation
cancelDownloadConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to cancel the download? Downloaded files will be kept.

autoKick.description: Auto-Kick is a system that automatically kicks players from a mission once they complete it. It can also claim any rewards and transfers materials from your storage to your backpack.

importantNotes.0: If you have multiple accounts playing the same mission, you don't need to add all of them to the Auto-Kick system. The system will automatically kick them.
importantNotes.1: If claiming rewards doesn't work or there is a bug, adjust the "Claiming Rewards Delay" in the settings (found in the top right corner).

howToUse.0: Login to an account that you want to turn into a taxi. This account shouldn't be your main!
howToUse.1: Start the taxi service by clicking the button.
howToUse.2: Invite the taxi to your party.
howToUse.3: Finally, set Team Fill to "No Fill" and start the mission.

importantNotes.0: Team Fill option must be set to "No Fill".
importantNotes.1: The taxi bot lets you access high power level missions, however it can't take you to worlds like Twine Peaks until you complete your Storm Shield Defenses.
importantNotes.2: The taxi works for both normal missions and ventures. No additional configuration is needed.

customStatus.description: It allows you to set a custom status in the game, as the name suggests.
